thread.title: Akshay D

author: Akshay D
title: Akshay D
text:
My overall experience with Travelpod right from booking, sales and post sales was excellent. All the members I interacted with including Neha, Michael and Ammy proved outstanding in their understanding of my needs and giving solutions.
Neha not only ensured I got the best flight, but also the price. She kept patience and understanding when after few hours of working out tickets I withdrawn due to genuine reasons.
Michael was quick to book next day ticket for my emergency travel on 30-Dec
After sales customer support from Ammy excellent. She helped generate invoices.
My experience is travelpod is no-nonsense service. I ended up referring them to my family and friends.
